name: graphql-lambda-terraform
description: Example graphql lambda application with terraform IAC(infrastructure as code)
author: Lucid Programmer<lucidprogrammer@hotmail.com>

scripts.zip-graphql: yarn run production-install && git archive -9 -o ./build/graphql.zip HEAD:src/graphql && cd build && zip -ur ./graphql.zip . -i "node_modules/*"
scripts.test-deploy-plan: TF_VAR_deploy_stage=test yarn run zip && terraform plan -out=./infrastructure/deployment/test/terraform.tfstate
scripts.test-deploy: TF_VAR_deploy_stage=test yarn run test-deploy-plan && terraform apply ./infrastructure/deployment/test/terraform.tfstate
